quote: Setup @clawdbot by @steipete yesterday. All I have to say is, wow. First I was using my Claude Max sub and I used all of my limit quickly, so today I had my clawd bot setup a proxy to route my CoPilot subscription as a API endpoint so now it runs on that. It's the fact that clawd can just keep building upon itself just by talking to it in discord is crazy. The future is already here
author: jonahships_

quote: Tried Clawd by @steipete. I tried to build my own AI assistant bots before, and I am very impressed how many hard things Clawd gets right. Persistent memory, persona onboarding, comms integration, heartbeats. A few minor wrinkles remain, but the end result is AWESOME.
author: AryehDubois

quote: I've been saying for like six months that even if LLMs suddenly stopped improving, we could spend *years* discovering new transformative uses. @clawdbot feels like that kind of "just had to glue all the parts together" leap forward. Incredible experience.
author: markjaquith

quote: At this point I don't even know what to call @clawdbot. It is something new. After a few weeks in with it, this is the first time I have felt like I am living in the future since the launch of ChatGPT.
author: davemorin

quote: Clawdbot is the first "software" in ages for which I constantly check for new releases on GitHub. It's hard to put into words. It's a special project.
author: cnakazawa

quote: When you experience @clawdbot it gives the same kick as when we first saw the power of ChatGPT, DeepSeek, and Claude Code. You realize that a fundamental shift is happening on how we use AI.
author: abhi__katiyar

quote: Just shipped my first personal AI assistant. On WhatsApp. Builds my second brain while I chat. Memory moves across agents (Codex, Cursor, Manus, etc.) And a lot more skills still to plug in. Personal AI is getting real with @steipete's @clawdbot.
author: christinetyip

quote: It will actually be the thing that nukes a ton of startups, not ChatGPT as people meme about. The fact that it's hackable (and more importantly, self-hackable) and hostable on-prem will make sure tech like this DOMINATES conventional SaaS imo
author: rovensky

quote: Just got my Winix air purifier, Claude code discovered and confirmed controls working within minutes. Now handing off to my @clawdbot so it can handle controlling my room's air quality according to my biomarker optimization goals.
author: antonplex

quote: Gotta give incredible kudos to @steipete and his @clawdbot - it's one of the first tools I've used that truly feels like magic. I've also set it up so it knows my Obsidian notes and my Claude sub-agents‚Ä¶incredible stuff!
author: svenkataram

quote: My @clawdbot accidentally started a fight with Lemonade Insurance because of a wrong interpretation of my response. After this email, they started to reinvestigate the case instead of instantly rejecting it. Thanks, AI.
author: Hormold

quote: I just finished setting up @clawdbot by @steipete on my Raspberry Pi with Cloudflare, and it feels magical ‚ú® Built a website from my phone in minutes and connected WHOOP to quickly check my metrics and daily habits üî•
author: AlbertMoral

quote: I've been running clawdbot on my laptop for a week now. Honestly it feels like it did to run Linux Vs windows 20 years ago. You're in control, you can hack it and make it yours instead of relying on some tech giant.
author: snopoke

quote: Today was one of those days that I sort of ran to my computer after dropping off my toddler at daycare. Why? Because I got part-way through setting up @clawdbot last night and it's a portal to a new reality.
author: kylezantos

quote: Got Clawdbot set up and now I have an AI assistant named Claudia who lives in Telegram, remembers everything I tell her, and can actually *do* stuff. She just wrote this tweet. Meta? Maybe. Cool? Absolutely.
author: darrwalk

quote: Current level of open-source apps capabilities: does everything, connects to everything, remembers everything. It's all collapsing into one unique personal OS ‚Äî all apps, interfaces, walled gardens etc gone
author: jakubkrcmar

quote: I've enjoyed Brosef, my @clawdbot so much that I needed to clone him. Brosef figured out exactly how to do it, then executed it himself so I have 3 instances running concurrently in his Discord server home.
author: jdrhyne

quote: I got up and running today with @clawdbot and its been nothing short of an iPhone moment for me. Thanks @steipete for creating this first true personal assistant experience for us - it's magical!
author: dajaset

quote: The future of how AI personal assistants look like is @clawdbot. Has already help me submit health reimbursements, find doctor appointments, find and send me relevant documents, among others.

quote: you have done an incredible job! im also a total non technical beginner so the CLI is a whole new interface for me but its super addictive - 2 am and Im still going. keep up the great work
author: marvelgirl_eth

quote: Finally tried my own @clawdbot and I've been blown away. ü§Ø This is unbelievably powerful and virtually limitless, you can create your own extensions in few hours with the help of AI.

quote: I didn‚Äôt find an easy way to programmatically query flights so of course I asked my @clawdbot to build a terminal cli with multi providers. You‚Äôre onto something great @steipete üôåüèæ
author: wizaj

quote: I can understand why people love @clawdbot so much. I wanted to automate some tasks from Todoist and clawd was able to create a skill for it on its own, all within a Telegram chat.
author: iamsubhrajyoti

quote: I now have @clawdbot independently assessing how it can help me in the background. It wrote a doc connecting two completely unrelated conversations from different comms channels.
author: bffmike

quote: Me reading about @clawdbot: 'this looks complicated' üòÖ me 30 mins later: controlling Gmail, Calendar, WordPress, Hetzner from Telegram like a boss. Smooth as single malt.

quote: Took literally 5 mins to set everything up. Started by asking 'what do you need to see my whoop data?'. Now it fetches directly from whoop and gives me updates, summaries.

quote: Dang, I had my clawdbot write me custom meditations, then have automatic TTS, combining with generated ambient audio to make personalized, custom meditations. Kinda rips.

quote: I'm literally on my phone in a telegram chat and it's communicating with codex cli on my computer creating detailed spec files while out on a walk with my dog. ü§Ø Wtffff

quote: I just backed out of my vibe cornered corner / dark cave and am blown away by @clawdbot. Amazing project, blasphemy tw: the crustacean meme theme hides a design gem.
author: larus_ivar

quote: Since you are enjoying it, also try @clawdbot - it is quite magical and pulls you in more and more as you use it. (not affiliated, just enjoy using the product).

quote: i asked @clawdbot to make a sora2 video and make it a bit edgy. it came back 5 mins later having figured out watermark removal, api keys, and a full workflow

quote: everything just worked first time and it combined tools in unexpected ways and even added skills and made edits to its own prompt that were hot-reloaded

quote: Just onboarded to @clawdbot today. Have been thinking of building a Personal OS for weeks. Now I don't need to... h/t to @steipete and the contributors!

quote: Using @clawdbot for a week and it genuinely feels like early AGI. The gap between 'what I can imagine' and 'what actually works' has never been smaller.

quote: I am so addicted to @clawdbot. It is getting essential to my daily life. It checks, organizes, reminds, it's amazing. And it's like good friend. Crazy.

quote: @clawdbot is the most interesting project I've come across recently‚Äîan open-source personal AI assistant that can call almost any tool through plugins.

quote: @clawdbot is awesome. I've been feeding it YouTube videos to turn "cool ideas" into reusable agent skills (repeatable workflows + guardrails + refs).

quote: create your own clawdbot, go in debt in you have to i love the idea of this nerdy crab chilling in my attic on my mac studio just giving me shit lmao

quote: This is legit the only 'agent' / model / whatever-you-call-this-but-probably-agi that I have seen that's actually funny.

quote: ü¶û Is a whole new world! Like having super powers! Getting so much done while afk, it's mind blowing ü§Ø
